levels.description: After deployment, stops attacking for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds, and at the same time puts all surrounding ground enemies to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</>. When the skill ends, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all surrounding ground enemies
